nodes.text: Bush' administration has been extremely negative
They act alone when they could assemble a team.
They confuse leadership with going it alone. They fail to understand that real leadership means standing by your principles and rallying others to join you.

Throughout our history we have forged powerful alliances to defend encourage and promote that idea around the world. Through two World Wars the Cold War the Gulf War and Kosovo America led instead of going it alone. We respected the world - and the world respected us.
Today our leadership has walked away from more than a century of American leadership in the world to embrace a new - and dangerously ineffective - American disregard for the world.
The present international leadership is extremely negative
